name: ConstantImageSource

members.name: Constant
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set the pixel value of the output.
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Get the pixel value of the output.

members.name: Origin
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set the origin value of the output image.
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Get the origin value of the output image.

members.name: Spacing
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set the spacing value of the output image.
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Get the spacing value of the output image.

members.name: Direction
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set the direction of the output image.
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Get the direction of the output image.

briefdescription: Generate an n-dimensional image with constant pixel values.
detaileddescription: Generates an image with constant value. The filter is useful to allow streaming of large images with a constant source, e.g., a tomography reconstructed with a filtered backprojection algorithm.
